statements: UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Call', interaction_datetime = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE interaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_details = 'Resolved issue', interaction_datetime = '2022-01-16 14:45:00' WHERE customer_id = '456e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Complaint', interaction_details = 'Received a complaint from the customer' WHERE interaction_id = 'abc123';

UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_details = 'Scheduled a follow-up meeting with the customer', interaction_type = 'Meeting', interaction_datetime = '2022-03-15 14:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 'xyz456';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_notes='Scheduled follow-up meeting' WHERE interaction_id=3;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'Alice', customer_email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_notes = 'Follow up meeting scheduled', interaction_date = '2023-12-15' WHERE interaction_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET address='123 Main Street, New York' WHERE customer_id=101;
UPDATE feedback SET satisfaction_level=5, feedback_text='Great service!' WHERE feedback_id=201;
UPDATE customers SET contact_number='123-456-7890', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1
UPDATE interactions SET notes='Meeting rescheduled to next week', interaction_type='Meeting' WHERE interaction_id=5
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_phone = '(123) 456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET product_price = 99.99, product_description = 'New product description' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'phone call', interaction_notes = 'Discussed product features' WHERE interaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE customers SET customer_phone = '123-456-7890', customer_address = '123 Main St, New York' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE Customer SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Order SET total_amount = 1500.0, order_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE order_id = 5;
UPDATE Customer SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Product SET price = 15.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 3;
